newsitem.title: USA: U.S. barge rates - Rates moderately quoted.
newsitem.headline: U.S. barge rates - Rates moderately quoted.

text.p: U.S. barge rates were moderately quoted on the St. Louis Merchants Exchange call session.
No barges traded versus none on Thursday.
- Two barges, upper Mississippi (St Paul-Savage), this week, bid unchanged at 135 percent of tariff - no offer.
- Four barges, Mississippi (Memphis through Cairo), one each week January, bid unchanged at 105 percent - no offer.
- Two barges, upper Mississippi (St. Paul-Savage), next week. bid at 135 percent of tariff - no offer.
- Two barges, Mississippi (St. Paul-Savage), week of July 6, bid at 135 percent of tariff, no comparison or offer.
- Four barges, Illinois River, two each week of July 6 and July 13. Bid at 100 percent of tariff, no comparison or offer.
- Four barges, Mid-Mississippi (McGregor and South), two each week July 6 and July 13. Bid at 100 percent of tariff, no offer or comparison.
- Four barges, Mississippi (St. Paul-Savage), one each week July. Offered at 135 percent of tariff, bid at 145 percent of tariff, no comparison.
